name: ITP 01 - Earthworks & Foundation Rev 1
1 - Preliminary and General
1.1 - Approve Hardfill Material - Aggregates for hardfill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: GAP40, GAP65, GAP100 or as per drawing
FREQUENCY: Once prior to construction
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Supplier’s test results
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Hold point
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Hold point
HOLD POINT
1.1 - Approve Hardfill Material - Sub Ballast (GAP40)

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: < 40mm, <7% Fines, <10% fines passing 2.36mm Sieve under test load 130kN, broken face content 50% for >37.5mm fraction and 19mm- 37.5mm fraction. Tested by crushing resistance test.
1.1 - Approve Hardfill Material - Structural fill/ Hardfill (GAP65)

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: < 65mm, <7% Fines, <10% fines passing 2.36mm Sieve under test load 130kn, broken face content 50% for >37.5mm fraction and 19mm- 37.5mm fraction. Tested by crushing resistance test.
1.1 - Approve Hardfill Material - Rockfill AP65/ AP100? AP100/300
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: <300mm, <7% Fines, <10% fines passing 2.36mm Sieve under test load 130kN. Tested by crushing resistance test.
1.1 - Approval of cut to fill material - Buttress Fill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Testing of MDD,voids WC.
1.1 - Approval of in-situ cut to fill - Soil Tests
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No contaminants
FREQUENCY: 3 x tests prior to construction
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ testing, Hills Lab
1.2 - Approve Geosynthetics - Geotextile and geofabrics separation and support of foundation soils, hardfill and buttress fill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design
FREQUENCY: Once prior to construction
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Supplier’s certificates
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Hold point
HOLD POINT
1.2 - Approve Geosynthetics - Geogrid
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification or alternative equivalent approved by engineer.
FREQUENCY: Once prior to construction
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Supplier’s certificates
1.2 - Approve Geosynthetics - Separation Geotextile
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification or alternative equivalent approved by engineer, TNZ F/7:2003
FREQUENCY: Once prior to construction
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Supplier’s certificates
1.5 - Set Out - Set out works as per IFC design
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey set out using digital model of IFC design
FREQUENCY: Prior to installation
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Survey pegs
2 - Earthworks
2.1 - Compaction Trials - Compaction trials for all fill types
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As detailed in 2.7 below
FREQUENCY: Prior to fill type placement
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Compaction trial report: fill type, methodology, lift thickness, compaction plant, number of passes, test results.
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Witness Point
2.2 - Erosion and Sediment Control - Implementation of silt control
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: IFC Design
FREQUENCY: Prior to Earthworks
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Photo documentation
2.3 - Strip Topsoil - Strip topsoil
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: IFC design
FREQUENCY: Each required location
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Photo documentation
2.4 - Excavation - Excavate to the dimensions, lines and levels
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Minimum Shear Strength 75kPa, minimum of 3 blows per 100mm using Scala to 1.5m
FREQUENCY: Each location
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Photo documentation; As-built report
2.4 - Formation Undercutting - Shear Vane
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No Individual test <80kPa, average >100kPa
FREQUENCY: 1 test per 5x5m, min 6 tests
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Shear vane test results. Contractor may perform.
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Witness Point
2.4 - Formation Undercutting - Scala Penetrometer
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Minimum of 3 Blows/100mm (cohesive), Minimum of 5 Blows/100mm (Granular)
FREQUENCY: 1 test per 5x5m, min 6 tests
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: CD QF 021 – Scala Penetrometer Test Sheet. Contractor may perform.
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Witness Point
2.5 - Subgrade approval - Inspection of excavated location
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design
FREQUENCY: Each location
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Signoff by Engineer.
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Hold point
HOLD POINT
2.6 - Geotextile and Triax Geogrid. - Install as per drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design
FREQUENCY: Each location
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Report, Photo documentation
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Hold Point
HOLD POINT
2.7 - General Filling - GAP100/300
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design – 95% MDD, Clegg 22 average over 5 tests, min value 18.
FREQUENCY: 1 set of NDM tests per 50m2. Of fill lift, max lift 500mm
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing (for NDM tests only)
2.7 - General Filling - GAP65
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design – 95% MDD, Clegg 22 average over 5 tests, min value 18.
FREQUENCY: 1 set of NDM tests per 50m2. Of fill lift, max lift 200mm
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing (for NDM tests only)
2.7 - Embankment Toe, Wetlands and Flood plane - AP100/300 Rockfill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design – 95% MDD, Clegg 22 average over 5 tests, min value 18.
FREQUENCY: 1 set of NDM tests per 50m2. Of fill lift
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing (for NDM test only)
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: Witness Point
2.7 - Buttress Fill - Suitable material as Cut to fill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Cohesive-Granular
2.7 - Buttress Fill - Lab Testing of fill Material
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Determine MDD
FREQUENCY: Prior to placement of fill
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing
2.7 - Buttress Fill - Cohesive Fill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Shear Vane Ave over 10 consecutive readings 100kPa, no single test <80kPa
FREQUENCY: 1 set per 250m3
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Shear Vane Test Results. Contractor may perform.
2.7 - Buttress Fill - In-situ density
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: ≥95% MDD
FREQUENCY: 1 set NDM per 250m2 of fill lift
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing
2.7 - Buttress Fill - Air Voids
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ave reading over 10 consecutive readings shall not exceed 6%, with no single reading above 8%
FREQUENCY: 1 set NDM per 250m2 of fill lift
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing
2.7 - Sub-ballast - GAP40
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design – 98% MDD, Clegg 22 average over 5 tests, min value 18.
FREQUENCY: 1 set NDM/Clegg per 50m2 of fill lift
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: IANZ accredited testing for NDM tests only
2.7 - Topsoil respreading Grassing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 50-100mm thickness, approved seed mix
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual
6 - As-built
6.1 - As-built - Contractor shall provide final As-built drawing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design
FREQUENCY: All structures
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: As-built drawing
6.2 - PS reports - Contractor shall provide PS reports
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per specification and IFC design
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Report
